OrganisationLabel: North York Moors National Park Authority
SiteNameAddress: Former Primary School, Claver Close, Swainby
OwnershipStatus: not owned by a public authority
Notes: The Local Plan for the North York Moors National Park Authority was at Examination in November 2019 and is expected to be adopted early 2020. When adopted the Local Plan will supersede the policies in the LDF referred to in the ‘Development Description’ column . Any planning applications for the sites on the Register will be assessed in accordance with the prevailing policies at that time.
